text: My child...
speaker: char.spirit

text: Why are you weary?
speaker: char.spirit

text: Do you not enjoy this time we spend together?
speaker: char.spirit

text: I have given you everything you could have wanted.
speaker: char.spirit

text: Shelter.
speaker: char.spirit

text: Safety.
speaker: char.spirit

text: Love.
speaker: char.spirit

text: Yet you still wish to leave this paradise.
speaker: char.spirit

text: You wish to throw everything away and for what?
speaker: char.spirit

text: Freedom?
speaker: char.spirit

text: To discover what is beyond? What is unknown?
speaker: char.spirit

text: My child...
speaker: char.spirit

text: Let me tell you... You will find no salvation beyond these trees.
speaker: char.spirit

text: This place is secluded from the rest of the world for good reason.
speaker: char.spirit

text: I only wanted what was best for you.
speaker: char.spirit

text: Tell me, child, do you still want to try?
speaker: char.spirit

text: Yes.
No.
Very well.
speaker: char.spirit

text: I suppose I can't stop you from trying.
speaker: char.spirit

text: However, I can certainly see to it that you do not succeed.
speaker: char.spirit

text: You must understand... I can't have anyone thinking that escape is an option...
speaker: char.spirit

text: It is for everyone's own good that I make an example of you.
speaker: char.spirit

text: You've made it this far... So... Don't dissapoint me.
speaker: char.spirit

text: Then, why?
speaker: char.spirit

text: Why go through all this trouble?
speaker: char.spirit

text: I... can't understand
speaker: char.spirit

text: Is this some sort of joke to you?
speaker: char.spirit

text: Is this just... something you wanted to prove?
speaker: char.spirit

text: No.
speaker: char.spirit

text: No, no no no no.
speaker: char.spirit

text: This won't do at all.
speaker: char.spirit

text: I'm sorry but I can't let you just walk away from this.
speaker: char.spirit

text: There's... an image to maintain, I'm sure you understand.
speaker: char.spirit

text: I'll just send you back, the fast way, one last time, and then we can forget about all of this and get on with our lives.
speaker: char.spirit

text: Well, come on, let's get this over with.
speaker: char.spirit
